Text:
Thanks for the Upload you do good work, but lets keep the cam work on the DVD/R section, just a suggestion. 
It's sort of misleading for some people who are actually looking for Blu Rays and High Res films.
You need to copy the link and paste it in a new tab. No idea why opning with "opening in new tab"-function does not work with shareimage.
the screenshots shows these are not HD rips?? they look like theater prints WTF?
Screenshots are from Underworld 2, not from Underworld Awakening.
Is this cam or BR rip?  Can anyone comment on quality?
Its a cam, but in "HD"... quality is no good... this should be in the cam section, not here
It would be nice if people do not label torrents "BRRip" or "BluRay" when the source is not actually a BR disc or master.

the screenshots are not working,,,,,,they say "403 Forbidden server" 

and yes proper labeling is very important so that people are not misled!
The voices come from the right channel and not from the center speker.
You can switch the audio from right channel to center and it will be just fine, except for an annoying buzzing sound that plays constantly through the movie.
